fr.escape.game.entity

Interface CollisionBehavior

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BonusCollisionBehavior, ComputerShipCollisionBehavior, PlayerShipCollisionBehavior, ShotCollisionBehavior

    public interface CollisionBehavior

    An interface for Behavior when Collisionable#collision(fr.escape.game.User, int, Entity, int) happened.

    Call by Collisionable.

    • Method Detail

      • applyCollision

        void applyCollision(User user,
                  Entity handler,
                  Entity other,
                  int type)
        Apply a behavior when a collision happened.
        Parameters:
        user - Current User.
        handler - Entity which handle the collision.
        other - Entity which collide with the handler.
        whois - Entity type for other.
